component.name: Social Media
component.description: Provides evidence about the sharing or the discussing of specific resource into the Twitter Community

detail.output: Total tweets scaned in a specific time interval (minute, day, month)

component.name: Citation
component.description: Provides evidence of the resource impact in publications saved in Pubmed Central (PMC) repository

detail.query: Keyword separated by comma. Includes all words and numbers in the title, abstract and article body, as well as in table and figure captions and in the article reference section
detail.output: Total publication that includes the keyword
